summary: Ted Hayden impersonates a wanted man and joins Gentry's gang only to learn later that Gentry was the one who killed his father. He saves Virginia Winters' dad's ranch from Gentry and also rescues his long-lost brother Spud.
cast: John Wayne|Virginia Brown Faire|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Lloyd Whitlock|Yakima Canutt|Lafe McKee|Billy O'Brien|Dick Dickinson|Earl Dwire|Horace B. Carpenter|Philip Kieffer|Artie Ortego|Tex Palmer|Archie Ricks|Hal Taliaferro|Blackie Whiteford
keywords: mysterious stranger|man with no name|b movie|poverty row film|double feature film
